name: endless_staircase
prompt: A staircase that never stops climbing, with doors on every landing leading to different versions of your life. What happens when someone keeps walking instead of choosing?
decoded: When someone keeps walking instead of choosing, they continue to follow the same path without making any decisions or changes. They miss out on the opportunity to explore different versions of their life and discover new experiences. This can lead to a sense of stagnation and unfulfilled potential.
